title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When selecting P1 and P2, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project menu item is not visible.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Select both P1 and P2. 2. Check the availability of the Open Project and Close Project menu items.
